name: visitor-form-application
description: Full-stack visitor management system with React, Node.js, and AWS RDS

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test -- --watchAll=false
